preclusion: This module is open only to students enrolled in the Engineering Scholars Programme.
description:
Leadership in engineering can take different forms and each journey is unique.

This module provides a platform for students to explore different means and take active steps towards honing their leadership skills based on their reflection of their needs and experiences.

Students will be guided by mentors towards programmes that could help them develop identified leadership skills in communication, collaboration, resilience, conflict resolution, and in leading teams. These may take the form of bootcamps, workshops and other sessions that can help them in in honing these skills.

This module is offered to students of the Engineering Scholars Programme.
title: Pathways to Engineering Leadership
